  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92727</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92727</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Le faisceau d'un phare</string>
            <string language="en">The headlight beam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Scheinwerferlichtstrahl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O feixe de farol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il fascio luminoso del faro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ακτίνα προβολέων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La viga de linterna</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que les faisceaux d'un phare de voitures ont les bords rectilignes parce que la lumière voyage en ligne droite.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the headlight beams of cars have straight edges because light travels in a straight line.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">faisceau</string>
            <string language="en">beam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ombre</string>
            <string language="en">shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die 
Scheinwerferlichtstrahlen der Autos gerade Ränder haben, weil Licht 
in eine gerade Geraden reist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os feixes de farol 
dos carros têm bordas retas porque a luz viaja em uma linha reta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i fasci luminosi 
del faro degli automobili hanno bordi diritti perché la luce viaggia 
in una linea retta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι ακτίνες προβολέων 
των αυτοκινήτων έχουν τις ευθείες άκρες επειδή ελαφριά ταξίδια 
σε μια ευθεία γραμμή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las vigas de 
linterna de coches tienen bordes rectos porque la luz viaja en una 
línea recta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtstrahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schatten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">feixe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sombra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fascio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ombra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
